\subsection*{API CHANGE 2.0 : }

List of the scheduled changes for the GFal 2.0 API \begin{Desc}
\item[Warning:]this is not a final choice\end{Desc}
\subsubsection*{I. BRIEF OF THE CHANGES : }

\begin{itemize}
\item POSIX API is still unchanged\item old gridftp support and associated functions are removed : (gfal\_\-ls, sfn\_\-$\ast$, gridftp\_\-$\ast$,...)\item SRM related API is modified in order to be easier to use\item Old ERRNO reprot system is changed for a new verbose one.\item LRC/RMC legacy support is dropped.\item Lots of the old dependencies are no more needed and are removed.\end{itemize}


\subsubsection*{II. OFFICIAL API : }

\begin{itemize}
\item Gfal POSIX lib API:\begin{itemize}
\item the Common functions API : \doxyref{all common functions}{p.}{group__common__group} \par
\item the POSIX style API : \doxyref{all POSIX style function}{p.}{group__posix__group} \par
 \par
\end{itemize}
\item Gfal REQUEST lib API :\begin{itemize}
\item the SRM style API : \doxyref{all SRM functions}{p.}{group__srm__group} \par
\item {\bf  internal API, use at your own risks } LFC\_\-API : \doxyref{internal LFC functions}{p.}{group__lfc__low__group}\item {\bf  internal API, use at your own risks } SFN\_\-API : sfn\_\-low\_\-group\item {\bf  internal API, use at your own risks } internal functions of gfal : \doxyref{internal functions}{p.}{group__internal__group}\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}
